/* SA012012.selectListSaleMst */ SELECT A.SALEID , B.SALEDATE , fn_codename('01', '014', B.SALEGUBUN) AS NAME_SALEGUBUN , B.CONNAME , CAST(B.CONM2 AS DECIMAL(12, 2)) AS CONM2 , CAST(B.CONPY AS DECIMAL(12, 2)) AS CONPY , C.SALEDANGA , C.SELLAMT , CASE C.REGYN WHEN 'Y' THEN '등기' WHEN 'N' THEN '미등기' ELSE '' END AS NAME_REGYN , C.REGDATE , fn_codename('03', D.CITYCODE, NULL) AS CITYNAME , (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = D.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = D.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME , D.ADDRESS , I.KNAME , (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE DEPTCODE = I.DEPTCODE AND GRADE = '007' AND DUTY = '002' AND RETIREDATE IS NULL LIMIT 1) AS MNGRNAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND DEPOSITYN = 'Y' ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sa_salemst T WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT SALEID FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = T.SALEID AND CHGGUBUN = '004') ) B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_saledtl C ON B.SALEID = C.SALEID INNER JOIN mm_buymst D ON B.BUYID = D.BUYID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst I ON B.SALERCD = I.INSACODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.DEPOSITDATE BETWEEN #S_DEPOSITDATE_FR# AND #S_DEPOSITDATE_TO#
AND B.SALEGUBUN = #S_SALEGUBUN#
AND C.REGYN = #S_REGYN#
AND D.ADDRESS LIKE '%$S_ADDRESS$%'
ORDER BY C.REGDATE DESC, A.SALEID ASC
